Sentencas: Concentrated zirconia pastes require optimization before they can be used in large-scale screen-printing processes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) manufacture.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: The present article investigates a series of terpineol-based zirconia pastes stabilized with ethyl cellulose of varying concentrations by combined rheological methods.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: Small additions of ethyl cellulose (up to 0.50 vol%) resulted in a significant increase in the shear viscosity, shear stress, and network strength of the pastes.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: In comparison with the properties of the ink vehicles, the observed elastic response of the ink pastes on the initiation of flow was attributed to the interaction of ethyl cellulose with the zirconia particles.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: This interaction was confirmed to be bridging flocculation by rheological methods.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: Start-up shear flow experiments assessed the elastic deformation of the pastes in greater detail.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: Application of transient network theory (TNT) to describe the properties of the pastes was confirmed by the linear dependence of the equilibrium shear modulus (G(infinity)) with increasing ethyl cellulose concentration.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: TNT provides a basis for explaining the rheological effects of bridging polymers in network suspensions and assessing their interaction with other organic additives in high solids volume suspensions.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films

Sentencas: This is a useful analysis for optimizing suspensions for screen-printing SOFC components among other applications.
Titulo: Rheological analysis of concentrated zirconia pastes with ethyl cellulose for screen printing SOFC electrolyte films
